fn.p: The authors declare there are no competing interests.
Roberto García-Roa conceived and designed the experiments, performed the experiments, analyzed the data, wrote the paper, prepared figures and/or tables, reviewed drafts of the paper.
Rodrigo Megía-Palma conceived and designed the experiments, performed the experiments, analyzed the data, wrote the paper, reviewed drafts of the paper.
Jesús Ortega wrote the paper, reviewed drafts of the paper.
Manuel Jara analyzed the data, wrote the paper, prepared figures and/or tables, reviewed drafts of the paper.
Pilar López contributed reagents/materials/analysis tools, reviewed drafts of the paper.
José Martín conceived and designed the experiments, analyzed the data, contributed reagents/materials/analysis tools, wrote the paper, reviewed drafts of the paper.
The following information was supplied relating to ethical approvals (i.e., approving body and any reference numbers):
Ethics clearance and permits for this research were obtained from Cabildo Insular de La Palma with the sampling permit 201302/030-A/OT-098/2013 and Tenerife, 13796/JBFT/CPA/AFF 97/13, 2013-00484.
The following information was supplied regarding data availability:
The raw data has been uploaded as Data S1.
